tool.name: SpectraST Filter
tool.command: python $__tool_directory__/spectrast_params.py --mode=filter #if $spectrastParams: '$spectrastParams' #end if '$spectrast_params' -o spectrast_create.params && mkdir -p outdir && spectrast -cFspectrast_create.params -cN'outdir/library' #for $splib_file in $splib_files: ${splib_file.extra_files_path}/library.splib #end for && mkdir -p '$output.files_path' && for i in library.splib library.sptxt library.spidx library.pepidx; do if [ -e outdir/\${i} ]; then cp -p outdir/\${i} '$output.files_path'; fi; done
tool.help:
**What it does**
Filter and Manipulate Spectral Libraries
